title: [Aulidie's Pottery, Showroom]
description: A fine layer of white pottery dust covers every flat surface in this shop.  Tall vases filled with wilted yellow ferns flank the doorway in a failed attempt at elegance.  Lanterns cast their warm yellow light across the shelves of pottery and blown glass behind the counter.  A slight breeze blows through a window set high in the east wall, cooling the shop.

A fine layer of white pottery dust covers every flat surface in this shop.  Tall vases filled with wilted yellow ferns flank the doorway in a failed attempt at elegance.  The only window is narrow and set high on the western wall, but sunlight shafting through still brightens the room slightly, and a light breeze drifting through eases the heat of the room.  Shelves filled with pottery and blown glass line the wall behind the sales counter.
